settings.title: About Us
settings.text:
Our web company consists of web programmers and designers with extensive experience in the web market. Each of us worked as hired worker to create templates for Magento, Shopify, Wordpress and others. We decided to unite our forces and to do projects such as we would like them to be in accordance to our experience in customer support. We want to make online shops better and more interesting.

We like Shopify because Shopify provides You with a variety of tools to help You set up and run Your business. Depending on the plan that You choose, You can find everything You need to showcase Your products online, to process payments, and to make Your store work for You.

Our support is available 10.00 – 18.00 GMT + 2 (Monday – Friday). We usually get back to you within 24 hours.
Complete buyer supply store, run by buyer, for buyer
Same day dispatch on all orders placed before 3:00PM
Free delivery available on all USA orders, $20 minimum spend
Professional advice and great support online or by phone
A price match guarantee for best prices on all our products

settings.title: WHY SHOP WITH US?
settings.subtitle: Shopify is the best ecommerce platform on the market today. It's designed to help people build their own, scalable online store with hundreds of built-in features.

settings.title: Of excellent reviews
settings.text: All our reviews can be found here. "Not only is it a beautiful theme, BigSteps is awesome with their customer service! Loving working with them!"

settings.title: More sales
settings.text: The quantity of our sales is primarily promoted by the quality of products. Secondly, monitor the market, fast and always useful customer support.

settings.title: Happy customers
settings.text: "Exceptional customer support is why you should by this theme. There is a group of very talented and eager to help developers behind this theme."

settings.title: FACTS ABOUT US
settings.subtitle: We create interesting, high-speed products on the Shopify platform. We recommend buying and testing immediately.

settings.author: Clifton C. Garrison
settings.text:
Very nice theme, with lots of useful customisation options built in. Customer support has been excellent, as any small issues, minor bugs or even small requests have all been catered for in a quick, professional and timely manner.

Highly recommend.

settings.author: Susan E. Davis
settings.text: They have always fulfilled my requests without any hesitation, responded to my emails and helped me develop my online store in the right way. So i would definitely recommend their them. Plus their theme is fantastic! They also always ask me for feedback and ways in which they can improve their service and their design of the theme.

settings.author: Charles K. Rust
settings.text:
Great looking and functional theme.
But what really stands out is the tremendously good customer service. I had two issues and request, they have been solved by the developer for free within 48hrs. Can only recommend this theme, but a good theme is nothing without good customer service. Here you get both - THANK YOU!

settings.title: What is FOXic?
settings.answer: FOXic – Multipurpose Shopify Theme. It comes with 10+ ready-made Home page layouts, 10+ product page variants, and over 40 other pages. FOXic is perfect for different category store websites: fashion, accessories, shoes, bags, t-shirts, electronics, furniture, sport, toys, nutrition, books, pets shop and any more… You can create many unique and modern websites with our theme. It is very easy to control and make it suit anything you need.

settings.title: Who is "Bigsteps"?
settings.answer: Our web company consists of web programmers and designers with extensive experience in the web market. Each of us worked as hired worker to create templates for Magento, Shopify, Wordpress and others. We decided to unite our forces and to do projects such as we would like them to be in accordance to our experience in customer support. We want to make online shops better and more interesting.

settings.title: Do you need theme support and customizations?
settings.answer:
Our support is available 10.00 – 18.00 GMT + 2 (Monday – Friday). We usually get back to you within 24 hours.

Item support includes:

1. Availability of the author to answer questions

2. Answering technical questions about item’s features

3. Assistance with reported bugs and issues

4. Help with included 3rd party assets
